data.event: According to the historian William Mallama Lugo, the city of Palmira arises in 1813 when Don Pedro Sim칩n C치rdenas gave the name of Villa de las Palmas.
In 2005, Palmira opened its first large and post modern shopping mall Centro Comercial Llanogrande Plaza, popularly called "La Catorce", after the department store 'La 14' located in the mall.
